title: Derankers
body:
I've had ten of them in the past week. They make you lose on purpose just because they want a lower level account so they can wreck some noobs or something but it's not cool. Most of them find it funny but it isn't allowed in the summoner so code. I'm pretty sure it states one cannot pureposly make another lose or something along the lines of. I'd really like riot to do something about this. I have gotten into bronze 1 lately and it's just been filled with derankers. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about that Burning Avalanche. 

Just remember, sometimes people aren't intentionally trolling even if they say they are, everyone has bad games [even in diamond people go 0/11]. 

Just remember, statistically you're less likely to have a deranker on your team (44/56%). I know it can be frustrating, but don't let it tilt you or make you rage, as those will negatively impact your games- and your likelihood of success. 

Best of luck getting to silver!
